title: Antenna Design - Rochester, NY
content:
Location:   
Rochester Institute of Technology, NY   
  
Description:   
The School of Design and the student IDSA chapter is hosting a presentation by Antenna Design on Thursday, January 16 at 3-4:30pm in Carlson Auditorium.   
   
A very interesting multidisciplinary design firm. You can check them out on the web at [www.antennadesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014140514/http:/www.antennadesign.com/)
author: nonformal
